description: Representatives of the Karlenese Federation and the Kingdom of Foreberg came to the city of Ear as both sides of the conflict agreed to start the mediation. After half a day of heated discussions, we don't seem to make any significant breakthrough. Forebergians' threatened to leave if the agreement isn't signed in the next hour. We've got a last chance to propose a bearable deal unless we want the tensions to escalate.

options.description: Narong should become a demilitarised sphere under international supervision. Controversial laws should be withdrawn.
Let's split the island into two separate territories based on the ethnicity even if resettlement will be needed.
They have to come up with the new ideas themselves - we've got nothing to propose.

title: The Ear Mediation
